 47  Generic evaluators.

 50#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 51template<template <typename> class ReduceT>
 52struct List<op::reduce<ReduceT> >
 53{
 54  typedef Make_type_list<be::cvsip, be::mercury_sal, be::generic>::type type;
 55};
 56#endif
 57
 58
 59/// Generic evaluator for vector reductions.
 60template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
 61	  typename                  T,
 62	  typename                  Block>
 63struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic, 
 64                 void(T&, Block const&, row1_type, impl::Int_type<1>)>
 65{
 66  static bool const ct_valid = true;
 67  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, row1_type, impl::Int_type<1>)
 68  { return true; }
 69
 70  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, row1_type, impl::Int_type<1>)
 71  {
 72    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
 73    typename ReduceT<VT>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
 74
 75    length_type length = a.size(1, 0);
 76    PRAGMA_IVDEP
 77    for (index_type i=0; i<length; ++i)
 78    {
 79      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i));
 80      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
 81    }
 82
 83    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length);
 84  }
 85};
 86
 87
 88/// Generic evaluator for matrix reductions (tuple<0, 1, 2>).
 89template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
 90	  typename                  T,
 91	  typename                  Block>
 92struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
 93                 void(T&, Block const&, row2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)>
 94{
 95  static bool const ct_valid = true;
 96  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, row2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)
 97  { return true; }
 98
 99  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, row2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)
100  {
101    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
102    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
103
104    length_type length_i = a.size(2, 0);
105    length_type length_j = a.size(2, 1);
106
107    for (index_type i=0; i<length_i; ++i)
108      PRAGMA_IVDEP
109      for (index_type j=0; j<length_j; ++j)
110      {
111	state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j));
112	if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
113      }
114
115    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_i*length_j);
116  }
117};
118
119
120/// Generic evaluator for matrix reductions (tuple<2, 1, 0>).
121template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
122	  typename                  T,
123	  typename                  Block>
124struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
125                 void(T&, Block const&, col2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)>
126{
127  static bool const ct_valid = true;
128  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, col2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)
129  { return true; }
130
131  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, col2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)
132  {
133    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
134    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
135
136    length_type length_i = a.size(2, 0);
137    length_type length_j = a.size(2, 1);
138
139    for (index_type j=0; j<length_j; ++j)
140    PRAGMA_IVDEP
141    for (index_type i=0; i<length_i; ++i)
142    {
143      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j));
144      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
145    }
146
147    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_i*length_j);
148  }
149};
150
151
152/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<0, 1, 2>).
153template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
154	  typename                  T,
155	  typename                  Block>
156struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
157                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<0, 1, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
158{
159  static bool const ct_valid = true;
160  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<0, 1, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)
161  { return true; }
162
163  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<0, 1, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)
164  {
165    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
166    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
167
168    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
169    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
170    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
171
172    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
173    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
174    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
175    {
176      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
177      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
178    }
179
180    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
181  }
182};
183
184
185/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<0, 2, 1>).
186template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
187	  typename                  T,
188	  typename                  Block>
189struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
190                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<0, 2, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
191{
192  static bool const ct_valid = true;
193  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<0, 2, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)
194  { return true; }
195
196  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<0, 2, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)
197  {
198    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
199    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
200
201    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
202    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
203    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
204
205    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
206    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
207    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
208    {
209      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
210      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
211    }
212
213    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
214  }
215};
216

218/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<1, 0, 2>).
219template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
220	  typename                  T,
221	  typename                  Block>
222struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
223                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<1, 0, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
224{
225  static bool const ct_valid = true;
226  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<1, 0, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)
227  { return true; }
228
229  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<1, 0, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)
230  {
231    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
232    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
233
234    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
235    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
236    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
237
238    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
239    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
240    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
241    {
242      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
243      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
244    }
245
246    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
247  }
248};

251/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<1, 2, 0>).
252template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
253	  typename                  T,
254	  typename                  Block>
255struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
256                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<1, 2, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
257{
258  static bool const ct_valid = true;
259  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<1, 2, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)
260  { return true; }
261
262  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<1, 2, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)
263  {
264    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
265    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
266
267    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
268    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
269    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
270
271    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
272    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
273    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
274    {
275      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
276      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
277    }
278
279    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
280  }
281};

284/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<2, 0, 1>).
285template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
286	  typename                  T,
287	  typename                  Block>
288struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
289                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<2, 0, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
290{
291  static bool const ct_valid = true;
292  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<2, 0, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)
293  { return true; }
294
295  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<2, 0, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)
296  {
297    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
298    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
299
300    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
301    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
302    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
303
304    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
305    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
306    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
307    {
308      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
309      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
310    }
311
312    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
313  }
314};

317/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<2, 1, 0>).
318template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
319	  typename                  T,
320	  typename                  Block>
321struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
322                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<2, 1, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
323{
324  static bool const ct_valid = true;
325  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<2, 1, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)
326  { return true; }
327
328  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<2, 1, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)
329  {
330    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
331    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
332
333    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
334    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
335    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
336
337    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
338    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
339    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
340    {
341      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
342      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
343    }
344
345    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
346  }
347};

351/***********************************************************************
352  Parallel evaluators.
353***********************************************************************/
354
355#if !VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
356template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
357          typename                  T,
358	  typename                  Block,
359	  typename                  OrderT,
360	  int                       Dim>
361struct Par_reduction_eval_base
362{
363  static bool const ct_valid = 
364    !impl::Is_local_map<typename Block::map_type>::value &&
365    impl::Reduction_supported<ReduceT<typename Block::value_type>::rtype,
366			      typename Block::value_type>::value;
367
368  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)
369  { return true; }
370};
371
372
373template <typename                  T,
374	  typename                  Block,
375	  typename                  OrderT,
376	  int                       Dim>
377struct Evaluator<op::reduce<impl::Mean_value>, be::parallel,
378                 void(T&, Block const&, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)>
379  : Par_reduction_eval_base<impl::Mean_value, T, Block, OrderT, Dim>
380{
381  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)
382  {
383    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
384    T l_r;
385    typedef typename impl::Distributed_local_block<Block>::type local_block_type;
386    typedef typename impl::Block_layout<local_block_type>::order_type order_type;
387    typedef impl::Int_type<Dim>                                       dim_type;
388    typedef impl::Mean_value<VT>                                      reduce_type;
389    typedef typename Block::map_type                            map_type;
390
391    dispatch<op::reduce<impl::Sum_value>, void,
392             typename impl::Sum_value<VT>::result_type&,
393             local_block_type const&,
394             order_type,
395             dim_type>
396      (l_r, get_local_block(a), order_type(), dim_type());
397
398    if (!impl::Type_equal<map_type, Global_map<Block::dim> >::value)
399	r = a.map().impl_comm().allreduce(reduce_type::rtype, l_r);
400    else
401      r = l_r;
402
403    r /= static_cast<typename reduce_type::accum_type>(a.size());
404  }
405};
406
407
408
409template <typename                  T,
410	  typename                  Block,
411	  typename                  OrderT,
412	  int                       Dim>
413struct Evaluator<op::reduce<impl::Mean_magsq_value>, be::parallel,
414                 void(T&, Block const&, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)>
415  : Par_reduction_eval_base<impl::Mean_magsq_value, T, Block, OrderT, Dim>
416{
417  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)
418  {
419    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
420    T l_r;
421    typedef typename impl::Distributed_local_block<Block>::type local_block_type;
422    typedef typename impl::Block_layout<local_block_type>::order_type order_type;
423    typedef impl::Int_type<Dim>                                       dim_type;
424    typedef impl::Mean_magsq_value<VT>                                reduce_type;
425    typedef typename Block::map_type                            map_type;
426
427    dispatch<op::reduce<impl::Sum_magsq_value>, void,
428      typename impl::Sum_magsq_value<VT>::result_type&,
429             local_block_type const&,
430             order_type,
431             dim_type>
432      (l_r, get_local_block(a), order_type(), dim_type());
433
434    if (!impl::Type_equal<map_type, Global_map<Block::dim> >::value)
435      r = a.map().impl_comm().allreduce(reduce_type::rtype, l_r);
436    else
437      r = l_r;
438
439    r /= static_cast<typename reduce_type::accum_type>(a.size());
440  }
441};
442
443
444template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
445	  typename                  T,
446	  typename                  Block,
447	  typename                  OrderT,
448	  int                       Dim>
449struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::parallel, 
450                 void(T&, Block const&, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)>
451  : Par_reduction_eval_base<ReduceT, T, Block, OrderT, Dim>
452{
453  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)
454  {
455    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
456    T l_r = T();
457    typedef typename impl::Distributed_local_block<Block>::type local_block_type;
458    typedef typename impl::Block_layout<local_block_type>::order_type order_type;
459    typedef impl::Int_type<Dim>                                       dim_type;
460    typedef ReduceT<VT>                                         reduce_type;
461    typedef typename Block::map_type                            map_type;
462
463    dispatch<op::reduce<ReduceT>, void,
464             typename ReduceT<VT>::result_type&,
465	     local_block_type const&,
466             order_type,
467             dim_type>
468      (l_r, get_local_block(a), order_type(), dim_type());
469
470    if (!impl::Type_equal<map_type, Global_map<Block::dim> >::value)
471      r = a.map().impl_comm().allreduce(ReduceT<T>::rtype, l_r);
472    else
473      r = l_r;
474  }
475};
476#endif
477
478} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
479} // namespace vsip_csl
480
481namespace vsip
482{
483namespace impl
484{
485
486template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
487	  typename                  ViewT>
488typename ReduceT<typename ViewT::value_type>::result_type
489reduce(ViewT v)
490{
491  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
492
493  typedef typename ViewT::value_type T;
494  typedef typename ReduceT<T>::result_type result_type;
495  typedef typename ViewT::block_type block_type;
496  typedef typename Block_layout<typename ViewT::block_type>::order_type
497    order_type;
498  typedef Int_type<ViewT::dim> dim_type;
499
500  result_type r;
501
502#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
503  Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::cvsip, 
504    void(result_type&, block_type const&, order_type, dim_type)>::
505    exec(r, v.block(), order_type(), dim_type());
506#else
507
508  typedef Make_type_list<be::parallel,
509                         be::cvsip,
510                         be::mercury_sal, 
511                         be::generic>::type list_type;
512
513  Dispatcher<op::reduce<ReduceT>, 
514    void(result_type&, block_type const&, order_type, dim_type), list_type>::
515    dispatch(r, v.block(), order_type(), dim_type());
516#endif
517
518  return r;
519}
520
521} // namespace vsip::impl
522
523
524
525/***********************************************************************
526  API Reduction Functions
527***********************************************************************/
528
529template <typename                            T,
530	  template <typename, typename> class ViewT,
531	  typename                            BlockT>
532typename impl::All_true<T>::result_type
533alltrue(ViewT<T, BlockT> v)
534{
535  typedef typename impl::Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type order_type;
536  return impl::reduce<impl::All_true>(v);
537}
538
539
540
541template <typename                            T,
542	  template <typename, typename> class ViewT,
543	  typename                            BlockT>
544typename impl::Any_true<T>::result_type
545anytrue(ViewT<T, BlockT> v)
546{
547  typedef typename impl::Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type order_type;
548  return impl::reduce<impl::Any_true>(v);
549}
550
551
552
553template <typename                            T,
554	  template <typename, typename> class ViewT,
555	  typename                            BlockT>
556typename impl::Mean_value<T>::result_type
557meanval(ViewT<T, BlockT> v)
558{
559  typedef typename impl::Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type order_type;
560  return impl::reduce<impl::Mean_value>(v);
561}
562
563
564
565// Note: meansqval computes the mean of the magnitude square
566
567template <typename                            T,
568	  template <typename, typename> class ViewT,
569	  typename                            BlockT>
570typename impl::Mean_magsq_value<T>::result_type
571meansqval(ViewT<T, BlockT> v)
572{
573  typedef typename impl::Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type order_type;
574  return impl::reduce<impl::Mean_magsq_value>(v);
575}
576
577
578
579template <typename                            T,
580	  template <typename, typename> class ViewT,
581	  typename                            BlockT>
582typename impl::Sum_value<T>::result_type
583sumval(ViewT<T, BlockT> v)
584{
585  typedef typename impl::Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type order_type;
586  return impl::reduce<impl::Sum_value>(v);
587}

590
591template <typename                            T,
592	  template <typename, typename> class ViewT,
593	  typename                            BlockT>
594typename impl::Sum_sq_value<T>::result_type
595sumsqval(ViewT<T, BlockT> v)
596{
597  typedef typename impl::Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type order_type;
598  return impl::reduce<impl::Sum_sq_value>(v);
